Summary: Saw a white Orb, dropping down from the sky at night, dark clear sky.
divs: sighting detailsfriends and i were out that thursday evening, and walked down to the downtown square, at lake sumter landing, where some vendors were selling their wares at the down town square. our car was parked in the parking lot of the new hotel that had only been completed last year, and is located right on the lake. as we were going over the small wooden bridge, back to the parking lot to return to our car, i saw a white orb, descend from the sky, in mostly a perpendicular position to the horizon. it was moving at about the speed of a shooting star, at least at first, which i have seen many other times. it was a very dark night, and clear, so i was looking up at the stars, and noticed movement, directly above and in front of us. i would not be able to calculate a distance for the object. however, at first we all thought it was a shooting star. however, i never saw any type of tail from the orb, and thought that that was very peculiar. when i have seen shooting stars in the past, they all had some sort of a tail behind them that glowed with some other colors. this orb had no tail, and it seemed to slow down as it got closer to the horizon line. the orb seemed to shift its path slightly to the east\right very slightly as it slowed down above the horizon. the orb disappeared into the dark horizon line in front of us.
